kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: CC_AVERAGE (M853C0)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the connection capacity licence (MGW connection capacity) usage on MGW level. A connection is equal to the reserved H.248 contexts. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The average percentage of the connection capacity licence usage is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the samples taken from the simultaneously active H.248 contexts every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter CC_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: CC_PEAK (M853C1)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the connection capacity licence (MGW connection capacity) usage on MGW level. A connection is equal to the reserved H.248 contexts. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The highest value of the connection capacity licence usage is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples taken from the simultaneously active H.248 contexts every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter CC_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: CC_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C2)
kpi_info.use: The actual connection capacity licence (MGW connection capacity) feature capacity value on MGW level. A connection is equal to the reserved H.248 contexts. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The connection capacity licence feature capacity value is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: PC_IU_AVERAGE (M853C3)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Iu ATM IP 3G port capacity) usage for the WCDMA access port capacity (Iu termination) on MGW level. This counter includes both ATM and IP-based Iu. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The average percentage of the capacity licence usage for the WCDMA access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the samples taken from the simultaneously active Iu terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_IU_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_IU_PEAK (M853C4)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Iu ATM IP 3G port capacity) usage for the WCDMA access port capacity (Iu termination) on MGW level. This counter includes both ATM and IP-based Iu. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The peak percentage of the capacity licence usage for the WCDMA access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples taken from the simultaneously active Iu terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_IU_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_IU_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C5)
kpi_info.use: The actual capacity licence (MGW Iu ATM IP 3G port capacity) feature capacity value for the WCDMA access port capacity (Iu termination) on MGW level. This counter includes both ATM and IP-based Iu. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The port capacity licence feature capacity value of the WCDMA access port capacity is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: PC_IU_IP_AVERAGE (M853C6)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Iu IP 3G port capacity) usage for the IP-based WCDMA (Iu-CS) access port capacity (Iu-IP termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The average percentage of the capacity licence usage for the IP-based WCDMA access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the samples taken from simultaneously active Iu-IP terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_IU_IP_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_IU_IP_PEAK (M853C7)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Iu IP 3G port capacity) usage for the IP-based WCDMA (Iu-CS) access port capacity (Iu-IP termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The peak percentage of the capacity licence usage for the IP-based WCDMA access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples taken from the simultaneously active Iu-IP terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_IU_IP_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_IU_IP_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C8)
kpi_info.use: The actual capacity licence (MGW Iu IP 3G port capacity) feature capacity value for the IP-based WCDMA (Iu-CS) access port capacity (Iu-IP termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The port capacity licence feature capacity value of the IP-based WCDMA access port capacity is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: PC_NB_IP_AVERAGE (M853C9)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Nb IP backbone port capacity) usage for the IP backbone port capacity (Nb-IP termination and Nb'-IP termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The average percentage of the capacity licence usage for the IP backbone port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the samples taken from the simultaneously active Nb-IP terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_NB_IP_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_NB_IP_PEAK (M853C10)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Nb IP backbone port capacity) usage for the IP backbone port capacity (Nb-IP termination and Nb'-IP termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The peak percentage of capacity licence usage for the IP backbone port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples taken from the simultaneously active Nb-IP terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_NB_IP_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_NB_IP_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C11)
kpi_info.use: The actual capacity licence (MGW Nb IP backbone port capacity) feature capacity value for the IP backbone port capacity (Nb-IP termination and Nb'-IP termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The port capacity licence feature capacity value of the IP backbone port capacity is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: PC_MB_AVERAGE (M853C12)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Mb IP access port capacity) usage for the IP access port capacity (Mb termination) on MGW level. IP access includes also Fss and other SIP client interfaces. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The average percentage of capacity licence usage for the IP access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the samples taken from the simultaneously active Mb terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_MB_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_MB_PEAK (M853C13)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Mb IP access port capacity) usage for the IP access port capacity (Mb termination) on MGW level. IP access includes also Fss and other SIP client interfaces. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The highest percentage of capacity licence usage for the IP access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples which are taken from the simultaneously active Mb terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_MB_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_MB_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C14)
kpi_info.use: The actual capacity licence (MGW Mb IP access port capacity) feature capacity value for the IP access port capacity (Mb termination) on MGW level. IP access includes also Fss and other SIP client interfaces. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The port capacity licence feature capacity value of the IP access port capacity is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: PC_ATER_AVERAGE (M853C15)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Ater Interface) usage for the Ater access port capacity (Ater termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED: The average percentage of the capacity licence usage for the Ater access port capacity is calculated at the end a result accumulation period from the samples taken from the simultaneously active Ater terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_ATER_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_ATER_PEAK (M853C16)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the capacity licence (MGW Ater Interface) usage for the Ater access port capacity (Ater termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The peak percentage of capacity licence usage for the Ater access port capacity is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples taken from the simultaneously active Ater terminations every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter PC_ATER_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: PC_ATER_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C17)
kpi_info.use: The actual capacity licence (MGW Ater Interface) feature capacity value for the Ater access port capacity (Ater termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The port capacity licence feature capacity value of the Ater access port capacity is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: ECC_AVERAGE (M853C18)
kpi_info.use: The average percentage of the Echo Cancellation (EC) capacity licence (MGW EC) usage on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The average percentage of the Echo Cancellation (EC) capacity licence usage is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the samples which are taken from the simultaneously active TDM terminations with EC every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The average value calculated from the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter ECC_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: ECC_PEAK (M853C19)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the Echo Cancellation (EC) capacity licence (MGW EC) usage on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The peak percentage of the Echo Cancellation (EC) capacity licence usage is calculated at the end of a result accumulation period from the highest value of the samples taken from the simultaneously active TDM terminations with EC every 20 seconds during the measurement period. The highest value of the samples is divided with the licence feature capacity value (counter ECC_FEATURE_CAPACITY) and multiplied with 100.

kpi_info.title: ECC_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C20)
kpi_info.use: The actual Echo Cancellation (EC) capacity licence (MGW EC) feature capacity value on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence. UPDATED:The echo Cancellation (EC) capacity licence feature capacity value is read every time the feature information has changed.

kpi_info.title: PC_AOIP_AVERAGE (M853C21)
kpi_info.use: Average percent value of the capacity licence (MGW AoIP Interface) usage for AoIP access port capacity (AoIP-termination) at MGW level. If licence feature capacity value is unlimited or feature state is OFF, value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on licence.

kpi_info.title: PC_AOIP_PEAK (M853C22)
kpi_info.use: Highest percent value of the capacity licence (MGW AoIP Interface) usage for AoIP access port capacity (AoIP-termination) at MGW level. If licence feature capacity value is unlimited or feature state is OFF, value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on licence.

kpi_info.title: PC_AOIP_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C23)
kpi_info.use: Actual capacity licence (MGW AoIP Interface) feature capacity value for AoIP access port capacity (AoIP-termination) at MGW level. If licence feature capacity value is unlimited or feature state is OFF, value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on licence.

kpi_info.title: PC_MB_LTE_AVERAGE (M853C24)
kpi_info.use: Average percent value of the capacity licence usage for VoLTE access port capacity (Mb LTE termination) at MGW level. If licence feature capacity value is unlimited or feature state is OFF, value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence

kpi_info.title: PC_MB_LTE_PEAK (M853C25)
kpi_info.use: The highest percentage of the capacity licence usage for the VoLTE access port capacity (Mb LTE termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence.

kpi_info.title: PC_MB_LTE_FEATURE_CAPACITY (M853C26)
kpi_info.use: The actual capacity licence feature capacity value for the VoLTE access port capacity (Mb LTE termination) on MGW level. If the licence feature capacity value is unlimited or the feature state is OFF, the value of this counter is zero. This counter is optional and dependent on a licence.
